name: Permission
description: Only users with a specified permission
codes:
all_usernames_with_permission = [user.username for user in {platform}.get_users_with_permission(permission)]
return object.username in all_usernames_with_permission

name: Role
description: Only users of a specified role
codes:
all_usernames_with_roles = [user.username for user in {platform}.get_users(role_names=[role])]
return object.username in all_usernames_with_roles

name: UserID
description: Only users with the specified userIDs

variables.name: user_IDs
variables.label: Usernames
variables.prompt: Which ID the user should have?

name: Startswith
description: Only texts that start with the specified word

variables.name: word
variables.label: Starting word
variables.prompt: Which word do you expect the message starts wtih?

name: Equals
description: Only texts that equals the specified text

variables.name: text
variables.label: Expected text
variables.prompt: What do you expect the text to be

name: LengthGreaterThan
description: Only texts that have the length greater than the specified length

variables.name: length
variables.label: Maximumn length
variables.prompt: Which maximum length do you expect the text to be of?

name: BetweenStartAndEnd
description: Only timestamps that are between the specified start and end
codes: return start <= int(object) and int(object) <= end

variables.name: start
variables.label: Starting timestamp
variables.prompt: Which start time do you expect the timestamp to be after?

variables.name: end
variables.label: Ending timestamp
variables.prompt: Which end time do you expect the timestamp to be before?
